entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
